meanings.definition: To burst forth or break out suddenly and violently
meanings.sent1: The volcano was erupting with hot lava.
meanings.sent2: The geyser in the park is erupting right now.
meanings.sent3: The popcorn machine at the fair was erupting kernels everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like a volcano erupting in the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was like a sky erupting with colors.

meanings.definition: To release or emit something suddenly and forcefully
meanings.sent1: The soda can was erupting foam when it was opened.
meanings.sent2: The steam engine was erupting clouds of smoke.
meanings.sent3: The shaken soda bottle was erupting bubbles uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice was erupting emotions in the audience.
meanings.sent5: The factory chimney was erupting dark smoke into the sky.
